channel.title: Embedded Host Client on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Embedded Host Client on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: Update ESXi Embedded Host Client Fling
item.description: The ESXi Embedded Host Client Fling got an upgrade today, and in addition to new features it now works properly on ESXi 5.5. In addition to this, it’s also available as an offline bundle so you can distribute it with Update Manager. Since I’ve spent most of my day in esxcli, here is a quick post on how to perform the upgrade from a local http repository hosting the .
